title: UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, Professional Flash Non Toxic Safe Tattoo Halloween FX Party Artist Fancy Makeup Painting Kit For Kids and Adult
descriptions: Introducing the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette! Unleash your creativity with this professional makeup painting kit suitable for both kids and adults. With 20 vibrant and intense colors including gold, silver, pink, purple, red, and more, you can create a variety of looks for Halloween, festivals, carnivals, birthday parties, and more. The oil-based, non-toxic formula is safe for the skin and easy to blend, providing a comfortable and durable finish that is smudge-proof and quick-drying. Whether you're looking to create artistic makeup or special effects coloring, this palette has got you covered. Easy to apply and remove, this palette is a must-have for any makeup enthusiast. Get yours now and elevate your makeup game with UCANBE Athena!

Introducing the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, the ultimate professional makeup painting kit suitable for both kids and adults. With 20 vibrant and color-saturated flash and Aqua shades including gold, silver, pink, purple, red, yellow, blue, green, brown, black, and white, this palette is perfect for creating a variety of artistic and special effects looks for Halloween, festivals, carnivals, birthday parties, theme parties, and more. 

The oil-based, non-toxic, skin-friendly, and easy-to-blend formulation ensures comfortable wear, quick drying, smudge-proof finish, and minimal rub-off, making it durable and long-lasting. The plastic case packaging is sturdy and convenient, and the palette can be applied using a sponge or brush. Plus, it's easy to remove with olive oil or professional waterproof makeup remover.

Whether you want to create a crown, costume, bruise, blood, or cosplay look, the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette has got you covered. Elevate your makeup game and unleash your creativity with this high-quality, vibrant, and versatile palette. Get yours now and be the life of the party!
